trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能以座標為基礎的位置解析民事位址。

trans-unit.source: The CivicAddressResolver class provides an implementation of <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data.
trans-unit.target: CivicAddressResolver 類別提供的實作<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>的位置提供者提供座標和民事位址資料解析以座標為基礎的位置民事位址。</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式會從根據經度和緯度位置民事位址的解析。

trans-unit.source: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫會封鎖呼叫執行緒的執行，而被解析的位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event is raised when the address resolve operation completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>位址解析作業完成時，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A> member of the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> object that is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 已從解決民事位址`coordinate`參數由<xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A>隸屬<xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。</xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
The civic address that is resolved from the coordinate parameter.
trans-unit.target: 已從解決民事位址 coordinate 參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref> is returned if the address cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"></xref>如果無法解析的位址傳回的。

trans-unit.source: coordinate does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 會以非同步方式從根據經度和緯度位置位址解析。

trans-unit.source: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫不會封鎖呼叫執行緒的執行，而被解析的位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
coordinate does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*> completes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於位址解析時要呼叫所初始化<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>完成。</xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>
